content: increasing on the end feathers else they shrink in pitifully so i added one treble_crochet and a chain each row at the end feathers i also decided to increase the ch2 between stitch groups they are underlined starting on row 2 by one chain each row starting at row 3 so the double_crochet triangles could sink inward rather than being stretched out to try and meet the taller treble feathers you could work more or fewer row of section 3 but would have to sacrifice their picot-symmetry at the ends other possibilities for the picots 1 you could just skip the picots 2 you could put them between every treble_crochet on all the feathers 3 you could do 3 picots per feather 4 you could put them wherever you think they look best you could also use contrasting color s to accent section 3 after working treble fantasy i realized many people would prefer working double crochet stitches - so i worked a second shawl somewhat similar but using double_crochet stitches and my notes are after the directions for the original treble version the double fantasy version can be modified with a different starting chain length and different row counts for sections 1 and 2 as well treble fantasy v 3 april 26 2017 - page 3 of 13 treble fantasy section 1 nested treble fans all odd row work a fan in the center all even row work a single_crochet in center use the size 7 4 5mm hook for sections 1 and 2 fan = 5 treble_crochet worked in same place row 1 ch16 or mult of 12 + 4 fan in 6th chain from hook skip 1 chain single_crochet in next chain skip 2 chain fan in next chain skip 2 chain single_crochet in next chain skip 1 chain fan in last chain pm in center fan and move it up through the center on subsequent row 3 fans or an odd number of fans fancount = startchain+2 /6 if doing a crescent and now have 5 or more fans just skip right to row 6 single_crochet-in-fan = skip 2 treble_crochet work single_crochet in center treble_crochet skip last 2 treble_crochet of fan fan-in-single_crochet = work 5tr in next single_crochet row 2 normal fan row ch6 turn fan in 6th chain from hook single_crochet-in- fan fan-in-single_crochet single_crochet-in-fan through last fan fan around tch 4 fans big-fan = 3 treble_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 3 treble_crochet all worked in same place row 3 big-fan row ch6 turn fan in 6th chain from hook single_crochet-in-fan big-fan in next single_crochet single_crochet-in-fan fan in center single_crochet single_crochet-in-fan big-fan in next single_crochet single_crochet-in-fan fan around tch 3 fans 2 big-fans treble fantasy v 3 april 26 2017 -
